pullRequest.title: Allow upgrade logic per page type
pullRequest.bodyText:
Today, there's a lot of code within the initial data check and upgrade
path that's specific to a certain page type - for example, the database
is bundled for madani databases, the pages may be bundled in the future
for warsh databases, and so on.
This patch adds an interface wherein different page types can intercept
and handle updates on their own before going to the server for data.

commit.message:
Allow upgrade logic per page type

Today, there's a lot of code within the initial data check and upgrade
path that's specific to a certain page type - for example, the database
is bundled for madani databases, the pages may be bundled in the future
for warsh databases, and so on.

This patch adds an interface wherein different page types can intercept
and handle updates on their own before going to the server for data.

nodes.bodyText: one day, these will become suspending functions in sha' Allah...
moved into the madani implementation as an upgrade
was not used today - but was planning on using for warsh, so moved this as a warsh upgrade and removed from here.
